mapper.select: SELECT id, book_name AS bookName, category, format, publishing_house AS publishingHouse, download_link AS downloadLink, download_password AS downloadPassword, book_img_path AS bookImgPath, book_path AS bookPath, hold_time AS holdTime, click_rate clickRate, download_count AS downloadCount, author, book_status AS bookStatus, book_describe AS bookDescribe, book_size AS bookSize FROM book WHERE book_name LIKE "%"#{bookName}"%";
